titles: An Enquiry after further satisfaction concerning obeying a change of government beleeved to be unlawfull Tendred to the Presbyterian proposer, by way of reply to his book intituled; The lawfulnesse of obeying the present government. By a dissenting brother
notes: Item at reel 2502:10b bound following Wing L2100A and preceding Wing P4128.

Reproductions of original in the Cambridge University Library.
